text: @DuncanWestbury @NaturalEngland @NEFieldUnit @EnvAgency @DaveThroupEA Yep. Most farmers are not Guardians of the Countryside' and are only interested in monetary returns. The description is only accurate if you add a word. Choose from 'neglectful'; 'irresponsible'; 'ignorant' etc. Praise be to the few who truly love the land and wildlife.

@handles4forks @NaturalEngland @NEFieldUnit @EnvAgency @DaveThroupEA Totally agree. I can only think it is to prevent the area becoming a biodiversity hotspot in the interim. Barn owl hunt over the land in summer etc etc
